description: This file contains a definition of a thermostat scheduling system, including schedule processing logic, class definitions for WeekTime, and embedded JavaScript code for handling thermostat setpoints based on schedules and conditions.

classes.name: WeekTime
classes.description: A class representing a weekly time with methods for comparison and manipulation of schedule times.

classes.name: ScheduleMode
classes.description: A constructor function representing a collection of schedule conditions.

methods.name: WeekTime.prototype.withDaysUpTo
methods.description: Returns a new WeekTime instance with days masked up to a certain point.

methods.name: WeekTime.compare
methods.description: Compares two WeekTime instances to determine the temporal order.
